price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߏ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߛߊߣߌ߲ߧߊ ߒ߬ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߦߋ߫ ߸ ߒ߬ߠߎ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߞߍߣߍ߲߫ ߕߐ߬ߢߍ߰ߒߕߋ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߓߏ߬
arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qālū sub'ḥāna rabbinā innā kunnā ẓālimīna
